item.description:
Enjoy a full afternoon and evening of music at Cara Irish Pub.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Martin England & the Reconstructed, Bradigan, and The Hibernian Loud Pipes & Drums will play beginning at 3pm.

The event is a benefit for the Dover Children's Center, providing low-cost child care and hot meals to local families.

Martin England is the long time front man for the popular alternative band, Pondering Judd.

Showtime: 3pm-6pm with Scalawag following that night!

Cara Irish Pub - 11 Fourth Street, Dover, NH

(Behind Dunkin Donuts - we'll do our best to meet up but folks may arrive/leave at different times.)

Dover Children's Center Our mission is to provide affordable, high quality child care to all persons in the city of Dover and surrounding communities, for children 6 weeks to 12 years. Priority in placement is given to children from low-income families, and children with social, behavioral, or educational needs. We accept all clients regardless of race, creed, color, religion, political affiliation or beliefs, national origin or handicaps.

Donations of gift cards for clothing and grocery stores are greatly appreciated, especially Fiddlehead Farms.

Description DCC is a non-profit organization providing full-time child care, as well as before and after school childcare, and school-age summer program. We are licensed for 144 children. Included in our program are breakfast, hot lunch and snack, prepared by a full-time cook. There are also pre-school and kindergarten components. The teachers work closely with the Dover Public School's Preschool Dept. in the Early Intervention Program. This helps to identify children at an early age that may have developmental or learning delays. Located at 43 Back River Rd. Dover, NH.


Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup, including travel to and from the event. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: MUSIC @ Cara Irish Pub
